name: spreadsheetNew
description: Creates a ColdFusion spreadsheet object, which represents a single sheet of an Excel document.

params.name: sheetname
params.description: String value to be used as the sheet name.

params.name: xmlFormat
params.description: Boolean value to indicate the use of Excels xlsx format.

examples.title: Create xlsx sheet
examples.description: xlsx files with and with out sheet name

examples.title: Create xls sheet
examples.description: xls files with and with out sheet name
